thread.title: Zimbabwe: Queen of Grace Vendors Group Says It Has Blessings From Service Chiefs
thread.title_full: Zimbabwe: Queen of Grace Vendors Group Says It Has Blessings From Service Chiefs

title: Zimbabwe: Queen of Grace Vendors Group Says It Has Blessings From Service Chiefs
text:
"Guys, I tell you that you are simply killing pro-government people; we were given an order by the ministry (local government) and JOC in particular that we do the vendor registration and clean-up campaign," charged Chizola. 
"We are the only organisation which did that and it was perfect." 
On Wednesday, Harare city council demolished vending stalls which put up in illegal spaces in the central business district, including those belonging to Queen of Grace Zim Asset members. 
Some of the stalls had Grace Mugabe's pictures and President Robert Mugabe's portraits. 
Chizola said the city council should leave members of his group alone or give them first preference in the allocation of new trading spaces. 
"Fight with others but let us go simple and that is my word. I know you want wrestling. What is happening is tarnishing the country and the President," he said before accusing the MDC-T of hijacking the vendors cause. 
"What they want to do is to cause riots so that their masters would say President Mugabe has failed to rule," he said. 
Harare Mayor Bernard Manyenyeni last week warned politicians against interfering with the on-going vendor registration process. Zimbabwe
